title: Need help finding the name of this font
author: k6u6l6t

comments.content:
An Apple system font in the original Mac. Not for sale. Info [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chicago\_%28typeface%29](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701124029/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chicago_%28typeface%29 "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chicago\_%28typeface%29")
